Package codeContext

Class ContextOptions

java.lang.Object
codeContext.ContextOptions
public class ContextOptions extends Object
Representation of context options to customize/streamline search under contexts and harvest executable callable code fragments
Author:
Jakub Perdek

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private List<String>
    executableForms
    The list of executable forms/callable code fragments (in original form)
    private boolean
    foundActualInstance
    Information if actual instance is found during the search

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ContextOptions()
    Creates the context option instance to customize/streamline search under contexts
    ContextOptions(InnerContext actualContext, FunctionContext functionContext)
    Initialized context option to start search for given function context

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addExecutableForm(String executableForm)
    Inserts executable form/callable code construct (in original form) into associated callable constructs with this options
    org.json.simple.JSONArray
    exportAsJSONArray()
    Exports all executable forms/callable code constructs (in original form) from the context options as JSON array
    void
    extendAccordingPreviousForm(String previousBaseForm, String extensionOperator)
    Extends and add executable forms according to inner code construct form from this instance (this.executableForms) and replaces previous executable forms carried in this object -base form is merged with previous executable form -the extension operator (usually/in JavaScript, Java it is ".") is used to merge base form with previous executable form -example: "new A().callMe()" -the constructor is omitted
    void
    extendAndAddExecutableForm(String baseForm, String extensionOperator, String executableForm)
    Extends and add executable form from inner code construct and replaces previous executable form carried in this object -base form is merged with previous executable form -the extension operator (usually/in JavaScript, Java it is ".") is used to merge base form with previous executable form -example: "new A().callMe()" -the constructor is omitted
    void
    extendAndAddExecutableFormAll(String baseForm, String extensionOperator, List<String> executableForm)
    Extends and add executable forms from inner code construct -base form is merged with previous executable form -the extension operator (usually/in JavaScript, Java it is ".") is used to merge base form with previous executable form -example: "new A().callMe()" -the constructor is omitted
    void
    extendAndAddExecutableFormAllReplacement(String baseForm, String extensionOperator, List<String> executableForm)
    Extends and add executable forms from inner code construct and replaces previous executable forms carried in this object -base form is merged with previous executable form -the extension operator (usually/in JavaScript, Java it is ".") is used to merge base form with previous executable form -example: "new A().callMe()" -the constructor is omitted
    List<String>
    getExecutableForms()
    Returns the list of executable forms/code constructs (in original form)
    boolean
    isFound()
    Returns the information if the requested context is found
    void
    mergeBase(ContextOptions contextOptionsToBeMerged)
    Merges base context form with this one -all executable forms/callable code fragments (in original form) from base context are added to this context -if contexts are found (foundActualInstance of base context option instance is true) then foundActualInstance is set to true => the search can stop then
    void
    setAsFound()
    Sets the code context as found - the search as prepared to terminate

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • foundActualInstance

      private boolean foundActualInstance
      Information if actual instance is found during the search

    • executableForms

      private List<String> executableForms
      The list of executable forms/callable code fragments (in original form)

  • Constructor Details

    • ContextOptions

      public ContextOptions()
      Creates the context option instance to customize/streamline search under contexts

    • ContextOptions

      public ContextOptions(InnerContext actualContext, FunctionContext functionContext)
      Initialized context option to start search for given function context
      Parameters:
      actualContext - - the actual context from which the search begins
      functionContext - - the target context that should be found during the search and all intermediade calls harvested

  • Method Details

    • extendAndAddExecutableForm

      public void extendAndAddExecutableForm(String baseForm, String extensionOperator, String executableForm)
      Extends and add executable form from inner code construct and replaces previous executable form carried in this object -base form is merged with previous executable form -the extension operator (usually/in JavaScript, Java it is ".") is used to merge base form with previous executable form -example: "new A().callMe()" -the constructor is omitted
      Parameters:
      baseForm - - the base form to call inner objects such as class methods under instantiated class
      extensionOperator - - used to merge base form with previous executable form (usually/in JavaScript, Java it is ".")
      executableForm - - the executable form from previous code context that should be extended

    • mergeBase

      public void mergeBase(ContextOptions contextOptionsToBeMerged)
      Merges base context form with this one -all executable forms/callable code fragments (in original form) from base context are added to this context -if contexts are found (foundActualInstance of base context option instance is true) then foundActualInstance is set to true => the search can stop then
      Parameters:
      contextOptionsToBeMerged - - the base context form that is going to be merged with this one

    • exportAsJSONArray

      public org.json.simple.JSONArray exportAsJSONArray()
      Exports all executable forms/callable code constructs (in original form) from the context options as JSON array
      Returns:
      all executable forms/callable code constructs (in original form) exported from the context options exported as JSON array

    • getExecutableForms

      public List<String> getExecutableForms()
      Returns the list of executable forms/code constructs (in original form)
      Returns:
      the list of executable forms/code constructs (in original form)

    • addExecutableForm

      public void addExecutableForm(String executableForm)
      Inserts executable form/callable code construct (in original form) into associated callable constructs with this options
      Parameters:
      executableForm - - the executable form/callable construct (in original form) that is going to be inserted into associated callable constructs with this options

    • extendAndAddExecutableFormAllReplacement

      public void extendAndAddExecutableFormAllReplacement(String baseForm, String extensionOperator, List<String> executableForm)
      Extends and add executable forms from inner code construct and replaces previous executable forms carried in this object -base form is merged with previous executable form -the extension operator (usually/in JavaScript, Java it is ".") is used to merge base form with previous executable form -example: "new A().callMe()" -the constructor is omitted
      Parameters:
      baseForm - - the base form to call inner objects such as class methods under instantiated class
      extensionOperator - - used to merge base form with previous executable form (usually/in JavaScript, Java it is ".")
      executableForm - - the list of executable forms from previous code context that should be extended

    • extendAndAddExecutableFormAll

      public void extendAndAddExecutableFormAll(String baseForm, String extensionOperator, List<String> executableForm)
      Extends and add executable forms from inner code construct -base form is merged with previous executable form -the extension operator (usually/in JavaScript, Java it is ".") is used to merge base form with previous executable form -example: "new A().callMe()" -the constructor is omitted
      Parameters:
      baseForm - - the base form to call inner objects such as class methods under instantiated class
      extensionOperator - - used to merge base form with previous executable form (usually/in JavaScript, Java it is ".")
      executableForm - - the list of executable forms from previous code context that should be extended

    • extendAccordingPreviousForm

      public void extendAccordingPreviousForm(String previousBaseForm, String extensionOperator)
      Extends and add executable forms according to inner code construct form from this instance (this.executableForms) and replaces previous executable forms carried in this object -base form is merged with previous executable form -the extension operator (usually/in JavaScript, Java it is ".") is used to merge base form with previous executable form -example: "new A().callMe()" -the constructor is omitted
      Parameters:
      previousBaseForm - - the previously used base form to call inner objects such as class methods under instantiated class
      extensionOperator - - used to merge base form with previous executable form (usually/in JavaScript, Java it is ".")

    • isFound

      public boolean isFound()
      Returns the information if the requested context is found
      Returns:
      true if the code context is found otherwise false

    • setAsFound

      public void setAsFound()
      Sets the code context as found - the search as prepared to terminate
